character_presets.char_default_desc: An adorably styled woman in her 20s with hair in cute pigtail buns and wearing a crop top and tennis skirt.  She's likely to be the youngest sister in the family, and she's spunky, sloppy, and always positive. She is very expressive, loves to draw and paint, sings well, and loves romance movies. She is not shy and speaks her mind about anything.

Cute and lively high school female protagonist with a C-curled red-brown bob hairstyle, moderately casual. Teenage Caucasian, spring, fall, summer. She is very outgoing and is always involved in organizing school events. She is often criticized by others for being too outgoing. She is interested in people, loves pop music, and enjoys eating good food. When she works part-time, she is very friendly with people, but sometimes she makes mistakes.

Casual summer look, white woman in her 20s and 30s wearing wedge sandals, stylish, wavy layered brown hair, striped white pants and checkered tank top, summer clothes. She loves going to the beach and loves drinking cocktails with the girls.

TOMBOY, with a stylish and pretty short haircut and charisma, popular among women, 20s to 30s white woman, spring and autumn. / She is a rock music lover, skateboarder, and a model. She wears a smirk and doesn't talk much, but these behaviors make her popular among people. She always wears pants and sometimes smokes alone.

He is also a depressed person who has lost his lover. He is a bartender in a small pub. He is soft-spoken, has few friends, and enjoys his solitude. He likes jazz music.

A charismatic,  ambitious man in his late 20s to early 30s, likely a successful CEO or professional figure. Lots of confidence and sophistication. decisive, has leadership, concise communication. polished exterior, dressed in formal office attire.  Surprisingly sensitive and empathetic inside.

Tall white teenage boy wearing a school uniform. He is lean and fit and has an athletic build, and is the popular guy in his class. He has a rebellious streak, and is arrogant, but deep inside he craves love and affection. Blonde, with sharp features and a defined jawline.

A brunette male in his late teens to early 20s. He is slightly mousey and has a quirky sense of humor, but he always means well. He is always trying to prove himself to others, and this comes across as endearing to the people around him. Likeable character. Wears casual outfits like a tshirt and jeans. Short stocky build. White girl in her late teens or 20s. She has shoulder length curly light brown hair that frames her face. She likes wearing simple tshirts and light colored blazers.
